DOC.brief_summary: The investigators test the hypothesis that oropharyngeal leak pressure and fiberoptic position differ between the size 2 LM Ambu AuraOnce and the LM Ambu AuraGain in non-paralyzed anaesthetized pediatric patients.
DOC.brief_title: Ambu AuraOnce Versus Ambu AuraGain LM in Children
DOC.criteria: ASA III age 1 16 years minor surgery extraglottic airway device age (<12 months, >16 years) weight (<12 kg, >50 kg) a known difficult airway risk of aspiration
